# Introduction #

the mesozoic era was divided into three parts: the Triassic, Jurassic, Cretaceous. The mesozoic is wellknown beacause it's the period where the most biggest living being were; the dinosaurs. But they were many others animals and plants less known. Each of these parts of the mesozoic had their own fauna and flora.
